landing.title: Building communities to develop the future

siteIntro.title: At UP ACM
siteIntro.text: We envision a world where computing stands at the forefront of development - where we are able to use our skills to address the problems of tomorrow and create a positive impact on the community at large.

eventsIntro.title: Events
eventsIntro.text: The organization has pioneered several innovative projects for all levels of academic achievement, from the elementary level to the collegiate level. These ventures are integral to realizing our vision of forwarding the field of computing not only as science but as a medium for modern community development.

socialIntro.title: Stay Updated
socialIntro.text: You can reach us via Twitter, FB or email, if you have any queries. We make sure that our services can reach, and are reachable, by anyone and everyone.
